mapper.select: SELECT * FROM notice ORDER BY CAST(notice_id AS UNSIGNED) DESC LIMIT #{offset}, 5
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice (notice_id, user_no, notice_title, notice_content, notice_img, notice_attach, notice_attachpath) VALUES ((SELECT IFNULL(MAX(notice_id), 0)+1 FROM (SELECT notice_id FROM notice) AS dummy), #{userNo}, #{noticeTitle}, #{noticeContent}, #{noticeImg}, #{noticeAttach}, #{noticeAttachpath})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOTAL_RECORD_COUNT FROM notice
